text:
So, Producer!
Guess what Mitsumine wants to say right now!

I'm sure you'll figure it out.
After all, you're the one and only producer.

And today is a very special day──  if you don't get
it right, then Mitsumine will cry!

Huh!? Ah, you don't mean... m-my... birthday, right?
I'd feel embarrassed if it's not, though...!

Fufufu, just the answer and reaction I was looking for!
Well happy birthday, Producer!
